item.tinker_transplant.shuriken.descript:
The Shuriken is a fast, short ranged throwing weapon. It has high quantities but lower damage than bow.
Can be thrown from the off-hand.
item.tinker_transplant.arrow.description:
The Arrows are the ammo used for all bows and crossbows. Everyone provides many shots, but it need be consumed durability, and they can be modified as any tool.
Arrows can be thrown from your hands like Shurikens.
modifier.tinker_transplant.reload_tinker: When applied, your Tinker's bows and crossbows will consume Tinker arrows' durability instead of using them up
modifier.tinker_transplant.feather_repai: The Tinker arrow with feather-fletching can be automatically repaired by consuming feathers which is on your mainhand or offhand when broken.
modifier.tinker_transplant.swifter_arrow: Increase the initial velocity of the arrow by 20% per level.
modifier.tinker_transplant.loyal_arrow_r: The arrow will automatically return to the player like trident with loyalty.
modifier.tinker_transplant.like_fish_in_: Reduces arrowsâ€˜ water resistance to the same level as tridents
modifier.tinker_transplant.attack_blasti: When you hit the target, it will explode with a force increasing with the level, and it will consume more durability.
modifier.tinker_transplant.ender_speed.d: The projectile will fly with a high velocity, but it will not affect the final damage.
